Title: Authorizes industrial development agencies to finance certain facilities for the small city school districts
Summary: Authorizes industrial development agencies to finance certain facilities for the small city school districts; permits the financing, re-financing or reimbursement of the costs of the acquisition, design, construction, reconstruction, rehabilitation, improvement, furnishing and equipping of, or otherwise providing for such facilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง2503, Ed L; amd ยง858, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the general municipal law, in relation to authorizing industrial development agencies to finance certain facilities for the small city school districts
